title: Glottography dataset derived from Steever 2019 "The Dravidian Languages"
description: This dataset provides non-overlapping, contemporary speaker areas of Dravidian languages in South Asia as depicted in map 37.1 of Steever 2019.
citation: Steever, S.B. 2019. The Dravidian Languages. (Routledge Language Family Series.) Taylor \& Francis.
